alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:24PM CDT until July 05 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN HENRY...VAN BUREN...NORTHWESTERN LEE...SCOTLAND AND WESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 1024 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Salem to near Prospect Grove to 7 miles southeast of Greentop, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Kahoka, Memphis, Keosauqua, New London, West Point, Donnellson, Milton, Bonaparte, Salem, Wyaconda, Cantril, Hillsboro, Franklin, St. Paul, Rutledge, Luray, South Gorin, Granger and Pilot Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
